metadata.title: CVE-2022-1129 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Full Screen Mode in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 100.0.4896.60 allowed a remote attacker to spoof thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
